content:
Death lives on me but I don't live for death.
Death is immortal yet life is mortal.
There is no end to the endings, there are only beginnings of the ending.

But is death my ultimate goal? Or is it my limit?

Sometimes the mortal world feels so overwhelming that one may think of ending it all. But what makes us sure that after death it will be alright?

Will the nothingness of reality make us feel blissful or will it be a cruel prison with no escape?
